block.p: DeROSA-Anne (Antony). On July 11, 2000. Beloved wife of the late Salvatore. Devoted sister of Dr. Michael Antony and Thomas F. Anthony. Loving aunt of several nieces and nephews. Services will be held at St. Constantine & Helen Cathedral, 64 Schermerhorn St., Brooklyn, New York. Friday at 11AM. Visitation Thursday, 2-5, 7-9 at Mc Laughlin & Sons, Third Avenue at 97th Street, Brooklyn.
